ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(å…¨æ–‡|å…è´¹é˜…è¯»|æœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚).*|[(ï¼ˆ].*[ï¼‰)]/, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/ä¸­|å·²/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/[\(ï¼ˆã€].*[æ±‚æ›´è°¢ä¹å‘æ¨].*/, '') + ' â€¢ ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: 'ã€€ã€€æœ€è¿‘æ›´æ–°:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#bookIntro').replace(/.*(è§‚çœ‹å°è¯´:|ç®€ä»‹ï¼š)|å„ä½ä¹¦å‹.*/, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>
